project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A customer-facing portal that streamlines onboarding, improves time-to-value, and increases customer self-service capabilities.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in to the COSP using their existing credentials
SSO session management is secure and compliant with industry standards

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
dependencies: Integration with CRM for subscription data
acceptance_criteria: Customers see an accurate onboarding checklist based on their subscription tier
Checklist items can be marked as complete and tracked

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view all relevant product documentation within the COSP
Search results are accurate and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's usage metrics, such as daily active users and feature usage.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view their key usage metrics in an intuitive dashboard
Dashboard data is accurate and refreshed in a timely manner

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or Zendesk ticket with customer details.
dependencies: Integration with CRM and support ticketing system
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily initiate a support request or contact their CSM from the COSP
Customer details are correctly populated in the support ticket or email

integration_points: Knowledge Base API for content retrieval
Product Analytics Platform for usage metrics
technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests are handled by the frontend application, which communicates with the backend API server. The API server fetches data from the database, CRM, and other integrated systems, and returns the response to the frontend for rendering.
security_considerations: Implement OAuth 2.0 or OpenID Connect for secure authentication
Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict user actions
Regularly audit and update security practices to comply with ISO 27001

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core features of the COSP, focusing on the critical requirements.
deliverables: Integration with Identity Provider, CRM, and Knowledge Base API

implementation_phases.description: Implement additional features to enhance the COSP's capabilities.
deliverables: Integration with Product Analytics Platform and Support Ticketing System

risk_analysis.description: Delays in integrating with third-party systems (CRM, Knowledge Base, Analytics)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with integration partners early, establish clear communication and escalation channels, and have a contingency plan for manual data import/export

risk_analysis.description: Complexity in implementing the personalized onboarding checklists
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate sufficient time and resources for the feature, involve subject matter experts, and break down the implementation into manageable tasks

risk_analysis.description: Inability to meet the performance and scalability requirements
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct load testing early, optimize the application architecture, and plan for future infrastructure scaling

tools_and_technologies: Monitoring and observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana)
infrastructure_needs: Automated provisioning and deployment (e.g., Terraform, Ansible)

success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the CRM
Track feature adoption data from the product analytics platform

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM productivity metrics and ticket volumes

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and portal usage metrics
